name: Murky
title: Baby Murloc
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Slime
abilities.description: Deal 86 damage and apply Slime on nearby enemies for 6 seconds, slowing them by 20%. Deal 210 damage to enemies who are already Slimed.

abilities.name: Pufferfish
abilities.description: Spit out a Pufferfish with 225 health at the target point. After 3 seconds, the fish will blow up for 410 damage. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Safety Bubble
abilities.description: Becomes Invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.

heroics.name: March of the Murlocs
heroics.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

heroics.name: Octo-Grab
heroics.description: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

original.name: Murky
original.title: Baby Murloc
original.description: Mrgglglbrlg rmrmgllg mrggggm. Mrrglglgy, mgllglgl mgggrrmgl? MRGGGLGLLM! Mrrggllgggllggll mrrglrlg mrrg mrrg mrrrg.
original.shortDescription: Not quite a full Hero, Murky can place an Egg to respawn quickly back into battle.

baseHeroInfo.name: Murky
baseHeroInfo.title: Baby Murloc
baseHeroInfo.description: Mrgglglbrlg rmrmgllg mrggggm. Mrrglglgy, mgllglgl mgggrrmgl? MRGGGLGLLM! Mrrggllgggllggll mrrglrlg mrrg mrrg mrrrg.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: Not quite a full Hero, Murky can place an Egg to respawn quickly back into battle.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

trait.name: Spawn Egg
trait.description: Place an Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. Upon dying, Murky respawns at the Egg after 8 seconds. Murky only grants 25% of a real Hero's experience upon dying. If Murky's Egg is killed, he is revealed to enemies for 15 seconds, and Spawn Egg is placed on cooldown.

skins.name: Baby Murloc
skins.description: Mrgglglbrlg rmrmgllg mrggggm. Mrrglglgy, mgllglgl mgggrrmgl? MRGGGLGLLM! Mrrggllgggllggll mrrglrlg mrrg mrrg mrrrg.

skins.name: Landwalker Murky
skins.description: Do you live on land? Would you be more comfortable in water? Well now, with Murky's new conch-filtration device, you can stay wet, AND smell like crustaceans! Win win!

skins.name: Funny Bunny Murky
skins.description: Noblegarden is an important time of year for the inhabitants of Bunny Island. Even murlocs celebrate the festivities, hiding their eggs in the most inconvenient spots possible.

skins.name: Grunty Murky
skins.description: Alright, fess up... Who put the murloc in that power armor? Sammy? We talked about this... Guys, this is real cute and all, but how the heck are we supposed to get him out of there?
